data.text: Had a great stay at the hotel, very luxurious and comfortable. The staff are friendly and helpful. Food was delicious, however we had to pay for some a la cart restaurants. The bistro was very convenient as it is open 24 hours a day. Helpful when you need a  quick bite at an inconvenient time.
data.title: Amazing hotel!

data.text:
Great Hotel with excellent food and a multitude of restaurants to choose from. There are also many evening shows to have a drink at. 

The function training class in the mornings is great and would definately recommend. Efe is a great one on one trainer who can tailor excercise programs to your needs. 

As well as being a great holiday for meals out and good drinks I have also managed to improve my fitness!
data.title: Great family holiday with good entertainment and fitness component!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 'robertcL453AB',

Thank you for staying with us at Titanic Mardan Palace and taking the time to write a review of our hotel. It is so nice to read that you had such a wonderful stay with us and we were able to deliver a high level of service. 

We appreciate you mentioning our welcoming and friendly staff who works hard to give each guest a positive experience. 

We are happy to read that our amenities have exceeded your expectations.
We would be more than happy to welcome you again for another enjoyable holiday in the future.

Best Regards,
CRM MANAGEMENT

data.text:
Brilliant hotel . The best allinc I have been to. 

Hotel is beautiful and the food and drink is of a high quality . Staff are amazing . A special shout to guest services via Whatsapp. Brilliant idea and service !! 

If you want a hols in Turkey !! Come !!!
data.title: Amazing

data.text: We have just returned from a week away at this fabulous hotel.  The pool, bars and Monkey Club were amazing and drinks were plentiful.  All of the staff were helpful and they couldn’t do enough for you. The spa was excellent and we used it everyday at the end of the day.  We visited the steak restaurant which was probably one of the best meals we have ever had. They went above and beyond to make it extra special.  We never go all inclusive but this was definitely worth it and it wasn’t full of children.   We will be returning.
data.title: Amazing facilities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ''jilly13704''

Thank you for staying with us and for your review of our hotel. We're very pleased to learn of your great satisfaction while staying with us. We are truly happy to have been of service to you and certainly look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the future. 
Moreover, thank you very much for the warm words regarding the staff. We try to do our best that our guests will spend their holiday in the best way.

With our best regards,
CRM MANAGEMENT

data.text:
Our first family holiday to Titanic Marden Palace after seeing many amazing reviews on social media telling us how good it was.  And guess what? It did not disappoint!

Our family of five ranged from age 7 through to 45 and there was something for everybody.  Indoor and outdoor heated swimming pools.  24hr bistro restaurant. 24hr bars.  Unlimited play on arcade machines. Bowling alley. Pool tables.  Badminton.  Massive chess board outside.   Kids club. A gym. Live music performance every night.  The list goes on...

Also also the food was amazing. 
Top quality meals cooked by multinational chefs that cater to all tastes, from carnivores to vegans.   Nobody is left out.   Waiters take your drink orders from your table.  They clear buffet plates off you very quickly. Happily working hard and attentive every single meal.

No request is too much for any waiter or staff member.   And you don't get any judgement when asking for mutiple cakes or drinks or snacks.  Because after all it is an all inclusive resort and we like to get our money's worth!

Housekeeping staff were polite and friendly, even apologising when they came to tidy our room and woke us but it was our fault we forgotten to press Do Not Disturb. 

We spent 9 days here and would come again.  Recommended!

Our dates were  23 March to 1 April 2024.
data.title: Best 5 star experience ever!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for having chosen Titanic Mardan Palace for your holiday destination and taking the time to write such a wonderful review of our hotel. We are truly happy that you fully enjoyed your stay at Titanic Mardan Palace and found our facilities, service and staff interactions praiseworthy. Our team has made a commitment to offer friendly and efficient service. It makes us so proud to know that we were able to fulfill your expectations and provide your family and your friend with an unforgettable holiday. 
We already look forward to welcoming you and your family again for another great holiday with us. 

Kind Regards,
CRM MANAGEMENT
